alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern West Feliciana, western West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee, southwestern East Feliciana and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Roads to Erwinville to near Grosse Tete. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Roads, St. Francisville, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Morganza, Ramah, Batchelor, Erwinville and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
